import apiService from '../../services/api.service' import countriesService from '../../services/countries.service' import { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Form, FormControl, Button, Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../IndexPage/indexPage.css' const IndexPage = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState({ sourceCurrency: "", targetCurrency: "", sendAmount: '' }) const [source, setSource] = useState() const [sourceCountry, setSourceCountry] = useState() const { sourceCurrency, targetCurrency, sendAmount } = input const handleSourceInput = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setInput({ ...input, [name]: value }) sourceCall(sourceCurrency) } const handleInput = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setInput({ ...input, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() oneCall() } const oneCall = () => { apiService .getInput(sourceCurrency, targetCurrency, sendAmount) .then(({ data }) => { setSource(data.providers) console.log(data.providers) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } const sourceCall = () => { countriesService .getCountry(sourceCurrency) .then(({ data }) => { setSourceCountry(data) console.log('paissss', data) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return ( <>

Envío de dinero al exterior

Moneda enviada: {sourceCurrency}

Moneda recibida: {targetCurrency}

Cantidad a enviar: {sendAmount}

Entre las distintas opciones que encontramos, te ofrecemos estas:

{ source?.map(provider => { const { name, type, logos, quotes } = provider return <>

{type}: {name}

tipo de cambio: {quotes[0].rate} {targetCurrency}

comisión: {quotes[0].fee} {sourceCurrency}

cantidad recibida: {quotes[0].receivedAmount} {targetCurrency}
}) } ) } export default IndexPage
